resources.string: Greetings App
Hello blank fragment
Carpe Diem - Seize that day, and do something your future self will thank you for.
Never Lose Hope
Let Your Dreams Lead You
A Better Tomorrow
you’re on the ball it means that you’re very quick to understand certain things, very prepared for something or react quickly (and correctly) to a situation.
To go Dutch. Everyone pays for their own meal at a restaurant.
eat like a bird is to eat very little.
The tip of the iceberg .Just a small part of something much bigger.
Every dog has his day- Everyone gets a chance at least once
You can catch more flies with honey than you can with vinegar -You will get what you want by being nice.
“I went to the doctor the other day and said: ‘Have you got anything for wind?’ So he gave me a kite.”

“A woman gets on a bus with her baby. The driver says ‘Ugh – that’s the ugliest baby I’ve ever seen!.The woman walks to the back of the bus and sits down.She says to the man next to her: ‘The driver just insulted me!’The man says: ‘You go up there and tell him off. Go on. I’ll hold your monkey for you.\'”
Why do ducks have feathers? To cover their butt quacks!
What kind of shorts do clouds wear? Thunderpants
Why are toilets always so good at poker? They always get a flush
Two windmills are standing on a wind farm. One asks, ‘What’s your favorite kind of music?’The other replies, ‘I’m a big metal fan.’
How many tickles does it take to get an octopus to laugh? Ten tickles
What gets wetter the more it dries? A towel.h
Why teddy bears never want to eat anything? Because they’re always stuffed.
Where should you go in the room if you’re feeling cold? The corner—they’re usually 90 degrees.
